content: this is the written pattern of my cactus cat amigurumi crochet design please note that a video tutorial already exist on my youtube channel i ve made this written pattern as many people asked me for one this is a paid pattern but you can watch for free the video tutorial for this amigurumi on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/watch v=wufayvgbj9s the amigurumi is 8 5 cm tall you will need 4 colors of amigurumi cotton yarn green dark brown light brown and pink a 25 gr skein for each color should be enough the crochet hook needed is a 3 mm
